definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: I'll ask the dining-car attendant to come and you can tell him what you want.
sentences.chinese: 我把餐车服务员找来，您可以告诉他你要吃什么。

sentences.english: Dishes and plates were clattering in the dining car.
sentences.chinese: 盘碟在餐车中铿锵作响。

sentences.english: Didnt think in the same place, and the other a fast car with her.
sentences.chinese: 没想到在同个地点，还有另一辆快餐车跟她抢生意。

sentences.english: The Tastee Diner in Maryland opened in nineteen thirty-five.
sentences.chinese: 位于马里兰州的“品味”餐车开业于1935年。

sentences.english: Cafe bikes are not operated on trains by the Railways.
sentences.chinese: 列车上有吸烟休息室的餐车由铁道部门经营。

sentences.english: Yes, there is a restaurant carriage by soft sleeper carriage.
sentences.chinese: 是的，有餐车，在软卧车厢旁边。

sentences.english: The Tastee Diner also continues another tradition.
sentences.chinese: 这家“品味”餐车还延续着另一个惯例。

sentences.english: Is there a dining car on the train?
The dining -car provided various kinds of food.
sentences.chinese: 餐车供应种类繁多的食物。

sentences.english: As the sky darkened, we entered Iowa. And dinner was announced.
sentences.chinese: 天色变暗时我们进入了爱荷华，餐车开饭了。

sentences.english: One hauled off a gold-plated, wheeled cocktail cart.
sentences.chinese: 有一个人抢走了一个带轮子的镀金鸡尾酒餐车。

sentences.english: Nathan has worked as a cook at the Tastee Diner for ten years.
sentences.chinese: 南森已经在这家“品味”餐车里面做了十年的厨师了。

sentences.english: Three wagons arrived with a huge tube on each.
sentences.chinese: 他们推过三辆手推餐车来，车上有个大管子。

sentences.english: There are dining cars and sleeping cars in both trains.
sentences.chinese: 这两趟车都有餐车和卧车。

sentences.english: A:All right.Is the dining car open?
Cafe cars are operated on trains by the Railways.
sentences.chinese: 列车上有吸烟休息室的餐车由铁道部门经营。

definition: variant of 車廂|车厢[che1 xiang1]
attendant on an airplane, train, boat etc
by the window (referring to seats on a plane etc)
